ground_truth: TALL PEAKS rise on either side, like pillars holding up a sagging sky. AHEAD is the SUMMIT of CIRITH UNGOL and an ORC WATCH TOWER! A FAINT LIGHT glows from within the STONE TOWER. The PATH over the SUMMIT is in FULL VIEW of the ORCS. FRODO stays CLOSE to the ROCK WALL, masked by SHADOWS. Behind FRODO, SHELOB APPEARS! With hideous STEALTH, she follows FRODO. FRODO slowly climbing the STONE STAIRS, his GAZE and CONCENTRATION on the ORC TOWER. Behind him, SHELOB lurches into a HORRIBLE SCUTTLE down the SHEER ROCK FACE. FRODO suddenly senses the LURKING MALICE. He SPINS AROUND: Before he can react, SHELOB VICIOUSLY STABS FRODO in the NECK with her monstrous abdominal STINGER! FRODO instantly goes LIMP. SHELOB'S LEGS catch him as he falls, and she quickly starts WEAVING COBWEBS around him. With great dexterity, she tumbles the LITTLE HOBBIT over and over in her LEGS, binding him in WEB from HEAD to TOE! SUDDENLY! The RAZOR SHARP EDGE of a SWORD comes into shot. SAMWISE GAMGEE stands before the GIANT SPIDER -- STING clutched in one hand, the SHINING PHIAL in the other. SHELOB HISSES at SAM, DROPPING FRODO, who ROLLS down the STAIRS in his WEB COCOON. SAM moves forward, a fell light in his normally friendly eyes. SAM SWINGS the small sword, SLASHING upward! ANGLE ON: SHELOB HISSES and REARS above SAM, her STINGER dribbling with VENOM! SAM ducks inside the arch of her LEGS and STABS STING into one of her EYE CLUSTERS! CLOSE ON: SHELOB SCREAMS, her MANDIBLES thrashing wildly, GREEN OOZE trickling from her WOUNDED EYE. With HIND LEGS, SHELOB picks SAM off the ground and TOSSES him BACKWARDS! SAM lands heavily, and SHELOB POUNCES! ANGLE ON: SHELOB heaves the great bag of her BELLY high above SAM'S HEAD. As she splays her legs to drive her huge bulk down on him, SAM lifts the ELVEN BLADE above his head, holding it with TWO HANDS. STING slides into SHELOB'S SOFT UNDERBELLY! A SHUDDER runs through her! HEAVING up again, she wrenches herself away from the PAIN, her LIMBS writhing beneath her. JERKING and QUIVERING, SHELOB crawls to her HOLE, leaving a trail of GREEN-YELLOW SLIME. She SQUEEZES down the HOLE and DISAPPEARS, the SOUND of her BUBBLING MISERY fades. SAM RIPS COBWEBS away from FRODO'S HEAD, his FACE is DEATHLY PALE. FRODO'S head LOLLS LIFELESSLY in SAM'S ARMS. SAM lays his FACE on FRODO'S CHEST, WEEPING SOFTLY. SAM looks up. SAM looks up at the ORC TOWER and then at STING which is glowing BLUE! ORCS approach -- SAM must make a decision. A SMALL PARTY of ORCS and URUK-HAI heading down the STAIRS from the WATCH TOWER. SHAGRAT leads the URUK-HAI, and GORBAG leads the ORCS.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: TALL PEAKS ascend on either side, like columns supporting a drooping sky. AHEAD is the APEX of CIRITH UNGOL and an ORC OBSERVATION TOWER! A FAINT LIGHT shimmers from within the STONE TOWER. The TRAIL over the APEX is in FULL VIEW of the ORCS. FRODO remains CLOSE to the ROCK WALL, concealed by SHADOWS. Behind FRODO, SHELOB EMERGES! With hideous STEALTH, she trails FRODO. FRODO slowly ascending the STONE STAIRS, his GAZE and FOCUS on the ORC TOWER. Behind him, SHELOB jerks into a HORRIBLE SCUTTLE down the STEEP ROCK FACE. FRODO suddenly detects the LURKING MALICE. He TWISTS AROUND: Before he can react, SHELOB VICIOUSLY JABS FRODO in the NECK with her monstrous abdominal STINGER! FRODO instantly goes LIMP. SHELOB'S LEGS seize him as he falls, and she swiftly begins WEAVING COBWEBS around him. With great dexterity, she rolls the SMALL HOBBIT over and over in her LEGS, binding him in WEB from HEAD to TOE! SUDDENLY! The RAZOR SHARP EDGE of a SWORD enters the scene. SAMWISE GAMGEE stands before the GIANT SPIDER -- STING gripped in one hand, the SHINING PHIAL in the other. SHELOB HISSES at SAM, DROPPING FRODO, who ROLLS down the STAIRS in his WEB COCOON. SAM advances, a fell light in his normally amiable eyes. SAM SWINGS the small sword, SLASHING upward! ANGLE ON: SHELOB HISSES and RISES above SAM, her STINGER dribbling with VENOM! SAM ducks within the arch of her LEGS and JABS STING into one of her EYE CLUSTERS! CLOSE ON: SHELOB SCREAMS, her MANDIBLES thrashing wildly, GREEN OOZE streaming from her INJURED EYE. With HIND LEGS, SHELOB lifts SAM off the ground and HURLS him BACKWARDS! SAM lands heavily, and SHELOB POUNCES! ANGLE ON: SHELOB elevates the great bag of her BELLY high above SAM'S HEAD. As she spreads her legs to drive her huge mass down on him, SAM raises the ELVEN BLADE above his head, holding it with TWO HANDS. STING slides into SHELOB'S SOFT UNDERBELLY! A SHUDDER courses through her! HEAVING up again, she wrenches herself away from the PAIN, her LIMBS writhing beneath her. JERKING and QUIVERING, SHELOB crawls to her LAIR, leaving a trail of GREEN-YELLOW SLIME. She COMPRESSES down the LAIR and VANISHES, the SOUND of her BUBBLING MISERY diminishes. SAM RIPS COBWEBS away from FRODO'S HEAD, his FACE is DEATHLY PALE. FRODO'S head LOLLS LIFELESSLY in SAM'S ARMS. SAM lays his FACE on FRODO'S CHEST, SOBBING SOFTLY. SAM gazes up. SAM gazes up at the ORC TOWER and then at STING which is glowing BLUE! ORCS advance -- SAM must make a choice. A SMALL GROUP of ORCS and URUK-HAI descending the STAIRS from the OBSERVATION TOWER. SHAGRAT leads the URUK-HAI, and GORBAG leads the ORCS.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: TALL PEAKS are risen on either side, like pillars holding up a sagging sky. The SUMMIT of CIRITH UNGOL and an ORC WATCH TOWER are ahead! A FAINT LIGHT is glowing from within the STONE TOWER. The PATH over the SUMMIT is fully viewed by the ORCS. FRODO is stayed close to the ROCK WALL, and shadows mask him. SHELOB appears behind FRODO! FRODO is followed by her with hideous STEALTH. The STONE STAIRS are slowly climbed by FRODO, his GAZE and CONCENTRATION are directed toward the ORC TOWER. SHELOB lurches into a HORRIBLE SCUTTLE behind him, down the SHEER ROCK FACE. The LURKING MALICE is suddenly sensed by FRODO. He SPINS AROUND: Before he can react, FRODO is VICIOUSLY STABBED by SHELOB in the NECK with her monstrous abdominal STINGER! FRODO is instantly made limp. As he falls, he is caught by SHELOB'S LEGS, and COBWEBS are quickly started to be woven around him by her. The LITTLE HOBBIT is tumbled over and over with great dexterity in her LEGS, and he is bound in WEB from HEAD to TOE! SUDDENLY! The RAZOR SHARP EDGE of a SWORD is brought into shot. SAMWISE GAMGEE stands before the GIANT SPIDER -- STING clutched in one hand, the SHINING PHIAL in the other. SHELOB HISSES at SAM, and FRODO is dropped, rolling down the STAIRS in his WEB COCOON. Forward is moved by SAM, a fell light glowing in his normally friendly eyes. The small sword is SWUNG by SAM, and he SLASHES upward! ANGLE ON: SHELOB HISSES and is reared above SAM, her STINGER dribbling with VENOM! SAM ducks inside the arch of her LEGS and STABS STING into one of her EYE CLUSTERS! CLOSE ON: SHELOB SCREAMS, her MANDIBLES thrashing wildly, and GREEN OOZE trickles from her WOUNDED EYE. SAM is picked off the ground by SHELOB with HIND LEGS and is TOSSED BACKWARDS! SAM lands heavily, and SHELOB POUNCES! ANGLE ON: The great bag of her BELLY is heaved high above SAM'S HEAD by SHELOB. As her legs are splayed to drive her huge bulk down on him, the ELVEN BLADE is lifted by SAM above his head, holding it with TWO HANDS. STING is slid into SHELOB'S SOFT UNDERBELLY! A SHUDDER is run through her! She heaves up again, wrenching herself away from the PAIN, her LIMBS writhe beneath her. SHELOB is caused to crawl to her HOLE, JERKING and QUIVERING, leaving a trail of GREEN-YELLOW SLIME. The HOLE is squeezed down by her, and she DISAPPEARS, the SOUND of her BUBBLING MISERY fading. COBWEBS are ripped away from FRODO'S HEAD by SAM, his FACE is DEATHLY PALE. In SAM'S ARMS, FRODO'S head is lolled lifeLEssly. SAM lays his FACE on FRODO'S CHEST, and he is weeping softly. SAM looks up. SAM looks up at the ORC TOWER and then at STING, which glows BLUE! ORCS approach -- a decision must be made by SAM. A SMALL PARTY of ORCS and URUK-HAI head down the STAIRS from the WATCH TOWER. The URUK-HAI are led by SHAGRAT, and the ORCS are led by GORBAG.

FRODO'S head LOLLS LIFELESSLY in SAM'S ARMS. SAM lays his FACE on FRODO'S CHEST, WEEPING SOFTLY. SAM looks up at the ORC TOWER and then at STING, glowing BLUE! ORCS approach -- SAM must decide. The PATH is in FULL VIEW of the ORCS. FRODO stays CLOSE to the ROCK WALL, hidden by SHADOWS. Behind him, SHELOB APPEARS, following with STEALTH. FRODO climbs the STONE STAIRS, focused on the ORC TOWER. SHELOB lurches into a SCUTTLE down the ROCK FACE. FRODO senses MALICE, SPINS AROUND, but SHELOB STABS him in the NECK with her STINGER! FRODO goes LIMP. SHELOB'S LEGS catch him, quickly WEAVING COBWEBS around him, binding him from HEAD to TOE! SUDDENLY, SAMWISE GAMGEE appears with STING and a SHINING PHIAL. A PARTY of ORCS and URUK-HAI descends the STAIRS, led by SHAGRAT and GORBAG.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: TALL PEAKS rise majestically on either side, resembling colossal pillars that seem to support a sagging, overcast sky. AHEAD lies the formidable SUMMIT of CIRITH UNGOL, accompanied by an imposing ORC WATCH TOWER! A FAINT LIGHT, barely perceptible, glows eerily from within the ancient STONE TOWER. The PATH that traverses over the SUMMIT is in FULL VIEW of the ever-watchful ORCS. FRODO, with great caution, stays CLOSE to the ROCK WALL, skillfully masked by the enveloping SHADOWS. Behind FRODO, SHELOB APPEARS with terrifying stealth! With hideous, silent STEALTH, she follows FRODO, her presence menacing. FRODO is slowly climbing the worn STONE STAIRS, his GAZE and unwavering CONCENTRATION fixed on the distant ORC TOWER. Behind him, SHELOB lurches into a HORRIBLE SCUTTLE, descending the SHEER ROCK FACE with alarming speed. FRODO suddenly senses the LURKING MALICE behind him. He SPINS AROUND: Before he can react, SHELOB VICIOUSLY STABS FRODO in the NECK with her monstrous, venomous abdominal STINGER! FRODO instantly goes LIMP, his body rendered motionless. SHELOB'S LEGS catch him as he falls, and she quickly starts WEAVING thick COBWEBS around him. With great dexterity and speed, she tumbles the LITTLE HOBBIT over and over in her LEGS, binding him tightly in WEB from HEAD to TOE! SUDDENLY! The RAZOR SHARP EDGE of a SWORD comes into view. SAMWISE GAMGEE stands defiantly before the GIANT SPIDER -- STING clutched firmly in one hand, the SHINING PHIAL glowing in the other. SHELOB HISSES menacingly at SAM, DROPPING FRODO, who ROLLS helplessly down the STAIRS in his WEB COCOON. SAM moves forward with determination, a fell light burning in his normally friendly eyes. SAM SWINGS the small sword, SLASHING upward with force! ANGLE ON: SHELOB HISSES and REARS above SAM, her deadly STINGER dribbling with VENOM! SAM ducks swiftly inside the arch of her LEGS and STABS STING into one of her many EYE CLUSTERS! CLOSE ON: SHELOB SCREAMS in agony, her MANDIBLES thrashing wildly, GREEN OOZE trickling from her WOUNDED EYE. With her HIND LEGS, SHELOB picks SAM off the ground and TOSSES him BACKWARDS with great force! SAM lands heavily, and SHELOB POUNCES with intent! ANGLE ON: SHELOB heaves the great bag of her BELLY high above SAM'S HEAD. As she splays her legs to drive her huge bulk down on him, SAM lifts the ELVEN BLADE above his head, holding it with TWO HANDS. STING slides into SHELOB'S SOFT UNDERBELLY! A SHUDDER runs through her massive form! HEAVING up again, she wrenches herself away from the PAIN, her LIMBS writhing beneath her. JERKING and QUIVERING, SHELOB crawls to her dark HOLE, leaving a trail of GREEN-YELLOW SLIME in her wake. She SQUEEZES down the HOLE and DISAPPEARS, the SOUND of her BUBBLING MISERY gradually fades. SAM RIPS the sticky COBWEBS away from FRODO'S HEAD, revealing his FACE, which is DEATHLY PALE. FRODO'S head LOLLS LIFELESSLY in SAM'S ARMS. SAM lays his FACE on FRODO'S CHEST, WEEPING SOFTLY in despair. SAM looks up, his eyes filled with determination. SAM looks up at the ORC TOWER and then at STING, which is glowing BLUE! ORCS approach -- SAM must make a crucial decision. A SMALL PARTY of ORCS and URUK-HAI is heading down the STAIRS from the ominous WATCH TOWER. SHAGRAT leads the URUK-HAI, and GORBAG leads the ORCS.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Majestically rising toward the heavens, the towering peaks on either side of the narrow path resemble enormous, ancient pillars, almost as though they are supporting the drooping, somber overcast sky above. Ahead, looming large and formidable, lies the summit of the dreaded Cirith Ungol, accompanied ominously by an imposing ORC WATCH TOWER. From within this ancient stone fortress, a faint, barely perceptible light glows with an eerie luminescence, casting an unsettling atmosphere. The path that winds over the summit is fully exposed to the unceasing vigilance of the watchful orcs. Frodo moves with extreme caution, staying as close as possible to the cold rock wall, deftly masked by the enveloping and protective shadows. However, unbeknownst to him, behind Frodo, the monstrous Shelob appears. With terrifying stealth, she follows him, her presence menacing and filled with hideous, silent intent. Frodo carefully climbs the worn stone stairs, his gaze and unwavering concentration focused on the ominous orc tower in the distance. Behind him, Shelob lurches forward with a horrible scuttle, descending the sheer rock face with alarming speed and precision. Frodo suddenly senses the lurking malice creeping up behind him. He spins around quickly, but before he can react, Shelob viciously stabs Frodo in the neck with her monstrous, venomous abdominal stinger! In an instant, Frodo goes limp, his body rendered completely motionless. Shelob’s many legs catch him as he falls, and she quickly begins to weave her thick cobwebs around him. With great dexterity and alarming speed, she tumbles the little hobbit over and over in her legs, binding him tightly in web from head to toe! Suddenly, the razor-sharp edge of a sword appears in view. Samwise Gamgee stands defiantly before the giant spider. With Sting clutched firmly in one hand and the shining Phial glowing brightly in the other, Sam faces off against the terrifying creature. Shelob hisses menacingly at Sam, dropping Frodo, who rolls helplessly down the stairs in his web cocoon. With a fierce determination, Sam moves forward, a fell light burning fiercely in his normally friendly eyes. Sam swings the small sword with all his might, slashing upward with great force! The angle shifts as Shelob hisses menacingly and rears above Sam, her deadly stinger dripping with venom! Sam quickly ducks inside the arch of her many legs and stabs Sting into one of her numerous eye clusters! Close on: Shelob screams in agony, her mandibles thrashing wildly, as green ooze trickles from her wounded eye. With her powerful hind legs, Shelob picks Sam off the ground and tosses him backwards with great force! Sam lands heavily, and Shelob pounces toward him with aggressive intent! Angle on: Shelob heaves the great swollen bag of her belly high above Sam's head, preparing to crush him. As she sets to drive her massive body down upon him, Sam lifts the elven blade above his head, holding it tightly with both hands. Sting slides into Shelob’s soft underbelly! A shudder runs through her massive form as she writhes in pain! Heaving upwards again, she wrenches herself away from the agony, her limbs writhing beneath her. Jerking and quivering, Shelob crawls toward her dark lair, leaving a trail of green-yellow slime in her wake. She squeezes herself down the hole and disappears, the sound of her bubbling misery gradually fading away. Sam tears the sticky cobwebs away from Frodo's head, revealing his face, which is deathly pale. Frodo's head lolls lifelessly in Sam's arms. Sam gently lays his face on Frodo's chest, weeping softly in despair and sorrow. Then, gathering himself, Sam looks up, his eyes filled with determination. He glances at the orc tower in the distance and at Sting, which is glowing blue! Orcs are approaching -- Sam must make a crucial decision. A small party of orcs and Uruk-hai is heading down the stairs from the ominous watch tower. Shagrat leads the Uruk-hai, while Gorbag is at the forefront of the orcs.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Tall peaks rise majestically on either side, resembling colossal pillars that seem to support a sagging sky above. Ahead, the summit of Cirith Ungol looms ominously, crowned by an Orc watchtower that stands as a vigilant sentinel. A faint light emanates from within the stone tower, casting an eerie glow that pierces the surrounding darkness. The path over the summit lies fully exposed to the watchful eyes of the Orcs, creating a perilous passage. Frodo, with a sense of urgency and caution, stays close to the rock wall, skillfully masking himself in the shadows to avoid detection. Unbeknownst to him, behind Frodo, Shelob, the monstrous spider, appears with hideous stealth, her many legs moving silently as she follows him with predatory intent. Frodo, unaware of the danger lurking behind, slowly ascends the stone stairs, his gaze and concentration fixed intently on the Orc tower, oblivious to the threat that creeps ever closer. Behind him, Shelob lurches into a horrible scuttle, her massive form descending the sheer rock face with terrifying agility. Suddenly, Frodo senses the lurking malice, a chill running down his spine as he spins around in alarm. Before he can react, Shelob strikes with vicious speed, stabbing Frodo in the neck with her monstrous abdominal stinger. Frodo instantly goes limp, his body succumbing to the venom as Shelob's legs catch him mid-fall. With swift and practiced movements, she begins weaving cobwebs around him, her dexterous legs tumbling the little hobbit over and over, binding him tightly in a cocoon of web from head to toe. Suddenly, the razor-sharp edge of a sword slices into view. Samwise Gamgee stands defiantly before the giant spider, clutching Sting in one hand and the shining Phial in the other. Shelob hisses menacingly at Sam, dropping Frodo, who rolls helplessly down the stairs, encased in his web cocoon. Sam, undeterred, moves forward with a fierce determination, a fell light burning in his normally friendly eyes. He swings the small sword with precision, slashing upward at the monstrous creature. Shelob rears above Sam, her stinger dripping with venom, ready to strike. Sam ducks inside the arch of her legs, seizing the opportunity to stab Sting into one of her eye clusters. Shelob screams in agony, her mandibles thrashing wildly as green ooze trickles from her wounded eye. With her hind legs, Shelob picks Sam off the ground and tosses him backward with brute force. Sam lands heavily, the impact jarring him, but Shelob pounces, her massive form looming threateningly. As she heaves the great bag of her belly high above Sam's head, preparing to crush him, Sam lifts the Elven blade above his head, gripping it with both hands. With a decisive thrust, Sting slides into Shelob's soft underbelly, sending a shudder through her massive body. Heaving up again, she wrenches herself away from the pain, her limbs writhing beneath her as she retreats. Jerking and quivering, Shelob crawls to her hole, leaving a trail of green-yellow slime in her wake. She squeezes down the hole and disappears, the sound of her bubbling misery fading into the distance. Sam, his heart pounding, rips the cobwebs away from Frodo's head, revealing a face that is deathly pale. Frodo's head lolls lifelessly in Sam's arms, prompting Sam to lay his face on Frodo's chest, weeping softly in despair. As he looks up, Sam's gaze shifts to the Orc tower and then to Sting, which is glowing blue, a sign of approaching danger. Realizing the urgency of the situation, Sam knows he must make a decision as a small party of Orcs and Uruk-hai descends the stairs from the watchtower. Shagrat leads the Uruk-hai, while Gorbag leads the Orcs, their approach signaling an imminent threat.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: TALL PEAKS rise on either side, framing the SUMMIT of CIRITH UNGOL and an ORC WATCH TOWER, from which a FAINT LIGHT glows. The PATH over the SUMMIT is fully exposed to the ORCS. FRODO stays close to the ROCK WALL, hidden in SHADOWS, as SHELOB stealthily follows him. As FRODO climbs the STONE STAIRS, focused on the ORC TOWER, SHELOB scuttles down the ROCK FACE. Sensing danger, FRODO spins around, but SHELOB strikes, stabbing him in the neck with her stinger, rendering him limp. She quickly ensnares him in webs, binding him from head to toe. Suddenly, SAMWISE GAMGEE appears, wielding STING and the SHINING PHIAL. SHELOB hisses and drops FRODO, who rolls down the stairs in his cocoon. SAM advances with determination, slashing upward with STING. SHELOB rears above him, her stinger dripping venom, but SAM ducks and stabs her eye cluster. Screaming, SHELOB thrashes wildly, oozing green from her wound. She tosses SAM backward, but as she pounces, SAM thrusts STING into her soft underbelly. SHELOB shudders and retreats, leaving a trail of slime as she disappears into her hole. SAM tears the webs from FRODO, whose face is deathly pale, and weeps softly over him. Looking up, SAM sees the ORC TOWER and notices STING glowing blue, signaling the approach of ORCS. A small party of ORCS and URUK-HAI, led by SHAGRAT and GORBAG, descends the stairs from the WATCH TOWER.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Tall peaks rise on either side, like pillars holding up a sagging sky, reminiscent of the Misty Mountains known for their imposing beauty. Ahead looms the summit of Cirith Ungol, an ancient pass in the land of Mordor, and an orc watchtower, a relic from Sauron's dark regime. A faint light glows from within the stone tower, a signal of vigilance maintained by the orcs. The path over the summit is in full view of the orcs, notorious for their keen eyesight. Frodo stays close to the rock wall, masked by shadows cast by the moon in the perilous night. Behind Frodo, Shelob appears, a monstrous spider of legend feared even by Sauron's servants. With hideous stealth, she follows Frodo, who is slowly climbing the stone stairs, his gaze and concentration on the orc tower, a focal point of danger. Behind him, Shelob lurches into a horrible scuttle down the sheer rock face, a testament to her terrifying agility. Frodo suddenly senses the lurking malice, an instinct honed in the long journey. He spins around: Before he can react, Shelob viciously stabs Frodo in the neck with her monstrous abdominal stinger, a deadly weapon evolved for this very purpose. Frodo instantly goes limp. Shelob's legs catch him as he falls, and she quickly starts weaving cobwebs around him, an age-old method of ensnaring prey. With great dexterity, she tumbles the little hobbit over and over in her legs, binding him in web from head to toe, ensuring he cannot escape. Suddenly, the razor-sharp edge of a sword comes into shot. Samwise Gamgee stands before the giant spider — Sting, the famed Elven blade known for glowing blue in the presence of orcs, clutched in one hand, the shining phial, a gift from the Lady Galadriel filled with light from the star of Eärendil, in the other. Shelob hisses at Sam, dropping Frodo, who rolls down the stairs in his web cocoon, helpless yet untouched by death. Sam moves forward, a fell light in his normally friendly eyes, a transformation spurred by fierce loyalty and love. Sam swings the small sword, slashing upward! Angle on: Shelob hisses and rears above Sam, her stinger dribbling with venom, a liquid lethal enough to paralyze her victims. Sam ducks inside the arch of her legs and stabs Sting into one of her eye clusters, an act of bravery and desperation. Close on: Shelob screams, her mandibles thrashing wildly, green ooze trickling from her wounded eye, a fluid that speaks of her otherworldly nature. With hind legs, Shelob picks Sam off the ground and tosses him backwards, a demonstration of her immense strength. Sam lands heavily, and Shelob pounces! Angle on: Shelob heaves the great bag of her belly high above Sam's head, ready to crush him. As she splays her legs to drive her huge bulk down on him, Sam lifts the Elven blade above his head, holding it with two hands, his resolve unyielding. Sting slides into Shelob's soft underbelly, a vulnerable spot even for such a creature. A shudder runs through her! Heaving up again, she wrenches herself away from the pain, her limbs writhing beneath her in a frenzy. Jerking and quivering, Shelob crawls to her hole, a labyrinthine lair carved in the hillside, leaving a trail of green-yellow slime, the ichor of her defeat. She squeezes down the hole and disappears, the sound of her bubbling misery fades into the darkness. Sam rips cobwebs away from Frodo's head, his face is deathly pale, reminiscent of those under a deep spell. Frodo's head lolls lifelessly in Sam's arms. Sam lays his face on Frodo's chest, weeping softly, his heart heavy with grief and fear. Sam looks up. Sam looks up at the orc tower, a bastion of threat, and then at Sting, which is glowing blue! Orcs approach — Sam must make a decision. A small party of orcs and Uruk-hai, the fearsome crossbreed warriors bred for war, head down the stairs from the watch tower. Shagrat, known for his cruel leadership, leads the Uruk-hai, and Gorbag, infamous for his cunning, leads the orcs.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: TALL PEAKS rise on either side like pillars holding up a sagging sky. AHEAD is the SUMMIT of CIRITH UNGOL and an ORC WATCH TOWER. A FAINT LIGHT glows from within the STONE TOWER. The PATH over the SUMMIT is in FULL VIEW of the ORCS. FRODO stays CLOSE to the ROCK WALL masked by SHADOWS. Behind FRODO. SHELOB APPEARS. With hideous STEALTH. she follows FRODO. FRODO slowly climbing the STONE STAIRS his GAZE and CONCENTRATION on the ORC TOWER. Behind him. SHELOB lurches into a HORRIBLE SCUTTLE down the SHEER. ROCK FACE. FRODO suddenly senses the LURKING MALICE. He SPINS AROUND. Before he can react SHELOB VICIOUSLY STABS FRODO in the NECK with her monstrous abdominal STINGER. FRODO instantly goes LIMP. SHELOB'S LEGS. catch him as he falls and she quickly starts WEAVING COBWEBS around him. With great dexterity she tumbles the LITTLE HOBBIT over and over in her LEGS binding him in WEB from HEAD to TOE SUDDENLY. The RAZOR SHARP EDGE of a SWORD comes into shot. SAMWISE GAMGEE stands before the GIANT SPIDER  STING clutched in one hand. the SHINING PHIAL in the other. SHELOB HISSES at SAM. DROPPING FRODO who ROLLS down the STAIRS in his WEB COCOON. SAM moves forward a fell light in his normally friendly eyes. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. SAM SWINGS the small sword SLASHING upward. ANGLE ON SHELOB HISSES and REARS above SAM her STINGER dribbling with VENOM. SAM ducks inside the arch of her LEGS and STABS STING into one of her EYE CLUSTERS. CLOSE ON. SHELOB SCREAMS her MANDIBLES thrashing wildly. GREEN OOZE trickling from her WOUNDED EYE. With HIND LEGS SHELOB picks SAM off the ground and TOSSES him BACKWARDS. SAM lands heavily and SHELOB POUNCES ANGLE ON. SHELOB heaves the great bag of her BELLY high above SAM'S HEAD. As she splays her legs to drive her huge bulk down on him. SAM lifts the ELVEN BLADE above his head holding it with TWO HANDS. STING slides into SHELOB'S SOFT UNDERBELLY. A SHUDDER runs through her HEAVING up again. she wrenches herself away from the PAIN. her LIMBS writhing beneath her JERKING and QUIVERING. SHELOB crawls to her HOLE leaving a trail of GREENYELLOW SLIME. She SQUEEZES down the HOLE and DISAPPEARS the SOUND of her BUBBLING MISERY fades. SAM RIPS COBWEBS away from FRODO'S HEAD. his FACE is DEATHLY PALE. FRODO'S head LOLLS LIFELESSLY in SAM'S ARMS. SAM lays his FACE on FRODO'S CHEST WEEPING SOFTLY. SAM looks up. SAM looks up at the ORC TOWER and then at STING which is glowing. BLUE ORCS approach. SAM must make a decision. A SMALL PARTY of ORCS and URUKHAI heading down the STAIRS from the WATCH TOWER. SHAGRAT leads the URUKHAI and GORBAG leads the ORCS.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: SHORT TREES tumble on either side, like branches holding up a swinging ocean. BELOW is the BASE of MOUNT DOOM and a DRAGON GUARD POST! A DIM FLAME flickers from within the BRICK FORTRESS. The TRAIL along the BASE is in PARTIAL SIGHT of the DRAGONS. GANDALF stays FAR from the GRASS FIELD, hidden by BREEZES. In front of GANDALF, A GIANT TOAD MATERIALIZES! With graceful NOISE, he trails GANDALF. GANDALF quickly hopping down the METAL LADDERS, his GLANCE and AWARENESS on the DRAGON FORTRESS. In front of him, THE TOAD darts into a FRIGHTFUL DANCE up the SLOPING DIRT BANK. GANDALF immediately senses the WAITING JOY. He TURNS BACKWARD: Before he can blink, THE TOAD GENTLY NIPS GANDALF in the FOOT with its tiny feathered PAD! GANDALF instantly goes RIGID. THE TOAD'S WINGS catch him as he slips, and it swiftly starts SPINNING CORDS around him. With great agility, it rolls the LARGE WIZARD round and round in its WINGS, wrapping him in STRING from FOOT to CROWN! SUDDENLY! The BLUNT ROUND POINT of a BROOM comes into view. LEGOLAS GREENLEAF stands before the TINY FROG – BROOMSTICK clutched in one hand, the SHATTERED GLASS in the other. THE TOAD CROAKS at LEGOLAS, RELEASING GANDALF, who TUMBLES up the LADDERS in his STRING CASKET. LEGOLAS rushes backward, a dim shadow in his typically harsh face. LEGOLAS THRUSTS the short broom, PUSHING downward! ANGLE ON: THE TOAD CROAKS and DUCKS under LEGOLAS, its PAD dripping with SUGAR! LEGOLAS jumps outside the loop of its WINGS and THRUSTS BROOMSTICK into one of its TONGUE BUNCHES! CLOSE ON: THE TOAD WHISPERS, its JAWS rocking slowly, RED MIST dripping from its BROKEN TONGUE. With FRONT WINGS, THE TOAD yanks LEGOLAS off the ceiling and DROPS him FORWARD! LEGOLAS lands softly, and THE TOAD FLITS! ANGLE ON: THE TOAD tosses the small rope of its BACK high below LEGOLAS'S FOOT. As it spins its wings to pull its tiny body up on him, LEGOLAS drops the HARD STICK below his arms, holding it with ONE FOOT. BROOMSTICK slips into THE TOAD'S HARD OUTER-SHELL! A TREMOR crawls through it! SLIDING down again, it jerks itself towards the PLEASURE, its EARS flickering under it. HOPPING and STUMBLING, THE TOAD swims to its NEST, leaving a path of RED-BLUE FOAM. It FLIES over the NEST and APPEARS, the SOUND of its NAPPING JOY rises. LEGOLAS PULLS ROPE away from GANDALF'S FOOT, his BACK is BLISSFULLY DARK. GANDALF'S back SLUMPS VIGOROUSLY in LEGOLAS'S HANDS. LEGOLAS puts his BACK on GANDALF'S FEET, LAUGHING LOUDLY. LEGOLAS glances down. LEGOLAS glances down at the DRAGON FORTRESS and then at BROOMSTICK which is glowing GREEN! DRAGONS depart – LEGOLAS must choose a choice. A LARGE HERD of DRAGONS and GOBLINS floating up the LADDERS towards the GUARD POST. SENGRAT follows the GOBLINS, and VORBAG follows the DRAGONS.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Tall peaks surround the summit of Cirith Ungol and an Orc watchtower, with a faint light glowing from the stone tower. Frodo stays close to the rock wall, hidden in shadows, while the path is in full view of the Orcs. Shelob stealthily follows Frodo, who is focused on the Orc tower. Suddenly, he senses danger and turns, but Shelob stabs him with her stinger, rendering him limp. As she weaves him in webs, Samwise Gamgee arrives with Sting and a shining phial. Shelob drops Frodo, who rolls down the stairs. Sam, determined and fierce, slashes at Shelob, stabbing her eye. Despite being tossed aside, he stabs her underbelly with Sting. Shelob, wounded, retreats to her hole. Sam removes the cobwebs from Frodo, who appears lifeless. Weeping, Sam lays his face on Frodo’s chest, then looks at the Orc tower and sees Sting glowing blue, indicating Orcs are near. A small party, led by Shagrat and Gorbag, descends from the watchtower, forcing Sam to make a decision.

RAZOR SHARP EDGE of a SWORD comes into shot SHELOB HISSES at SAM the SHINING PHIAL in the other SAM moves forward a fell light in his normally friendly eyes DROPPING FRODO who ROLLS down the STAIRS in his WEB COCOON ANGLE ON SHELOB HISSES and REARS above SAM her STINGER dribbling with VENOM SAM SWINGS the small sword SLASHING upward CLOSE ON SAM ducks inside the arch of her LEGS and STABS STING into one of her EYE CLUSTERS GREEN OOZE trickling from her WOUNDED EYE SHELOB SCREAMS her MANDIBLES thrashing wildly SAM lands heavily and SHELOB POUNCES ANGLE ON With HIND LEGS SHELOB picks SAM off the ground and TOSSES him BACKWARDS As she splays her legs to drive her huge bulk down on him SHELOB heaves the great bag of her BELLY high above SAM'S HEAD STING slides into SHELOB'S SOFT UNDERBELLY SAM lifts the ELVEN BLADE above his head holding it with TWO HANDS she wrenches herself away from the PAIN A SHUDDER runs through her HEAVING up again SHELOB crawls to her HOLE leaving a trail of GREENYELLOW SLIME her LIMBS writhing beneath her JERKING and QUIVERING SAM RIPS COBWEBS away from FRODO'S HEAD She SQUEEZES down the HOLE and DISAPPEARS the SOUND of her BUBBLING MISERY fades FRODO'S head LOLLS LIFELESSLY in SAM'S ARMS his FACE is DEATHLY PALE SAM looks up SAM lays his FACE on FRODO'S CHEST WEEPING SOFTLY BLUE ORCS approach SAM looks up at the ORC TOWER and then at STING which is glowing A SMALL PARTY of ORCS and URUKHAI heading down the STAIRS from the WATCH TOWER SAM must make a decision SHAGRAT leads the URUKHAI and GORBAG leads the ORCS

test_cases.name: Rotate Half Paragraph
test_cases.description: ANGLE ON SHELOB HISSES and REARS above SAM her STINGER dribbling with VENOM  SAM ducks inside the arch of her LEGS and STABS STING into one of her EYE CLUSTERS  CLOSE ON  SHELOB SCREAMS her MANDIBLES thrashing wildly  GREEN OOZE trickling from her WOUNDED EYE  With HIND LEGS SHELOB picks SAM off the ground and TOSSES him BACKWARDS  SAM lands heavily and SHELOB POUNCES ANGLE ON  SHELOB heaves the great bag of her BELLY high above SAM'S HEAD  As she splays her legs to drive her huge bulk down on him  SAM lifts the ELVEN BLADE above his head holding it with TWO HANDS  STING slides into SHELOB'S SOFT UNDERBELLY  A SHUDDER runs through her HEAVING up again  she wrenches herself away from the PAIN  her LIMBS writhing beneath her JERKING and QUIVERING  SHELOB crawls to her HOLE leaving a trail of GREENYELLOW SLIME  She SQUEEZES down the HOLE and DISAPPEARS the SOUND of her BUBBLING MISERY fades  SAM RIPS COBWEBS away from FRODO'S HEAD  his FACE is DEATHLY PALE  FRODO'S head LOLLS LIFELESSLY in SAM'S ARMS  SAM lays his FACE on FRODO'S CHEST WEEPING SOFTLY  SAM looks up  SAM looks up at the ORC TOWER and then at STING which is glowing  BLUE ORCS approach   SAM must make a decision  A SMALL PARTY of ORCS and URUKHAI heading down the STAIRS from the WATCH TOWER  SHAGRAT leads the URUKHAI and GORBAG leads the ORCS TALL PEAKS rise on either side like pillars holding up a sagging sky  AHEAD is the SUMMIT of CIRITH UNGOL and an ORC WATCH TOWER  A FAINT LIGHT glows from within the STONE TOWER  The PATH over the SUMMIT is in FULL VIEW of the ORCS  FRODO stays CLOSE to the ROCK WALL masked by SHADOWS  Behind FRODO  SHELOB APPEARS  With hideous STEALTH  she follows FRODO  FRODO slowly climbing the STONE STAIRS his GAZE and CONCENTRATION on the ORC TOWER  Behind him  SHELOB lurches into a HORRIBLE SCUTTLE down the SHEER  ROCK FACE  FRODO suddenly senses the LURKING MALICE  He SPINS AROUND  Before he can react SHELOB VICIOUSLY STABS FRODO in the NECK with her monstrous abdominal STINGER  FRODO instantly goes LIMP  SHELOB'S LEGS  catch him as he falls and she quickly starts WEAVING COBWEBS around him  With great dexterity she tumbles the LITTLE HOBBIT over and over in her LEGS binding him in WEB from HEAD to TOE SUDDENLY  The RAZOR SHARP EDGE of a SWORD comes into shot  SAMWISE GAMGEE stands before the GIANT SPIDER  STING clutched in one hand  the SHINING PHIAL in the other  SHELOB HISSES at SAM  DROPPING FRODO who ROLLS down the STAIRS in his WEB COCOON  SAM moves forward a fell light in his normally friendly eyes  SAM SWINGS the small sword SLASHING upward
